Class Layout

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsScriptablePaddingProvider<ChartContext>

    public class Layout
extends ConfigurationOptionsContainer
implements IsScriptablePaddingProvider<ChartContext>
    The layout configuration is needed to set the padding.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
